title: Generated-the-power-of-ai-chats-C3E3P3q2O6A6V0e
prompt:
Generate a list of SEO-optimized article titles based on the following inputs:
	                Topic: [[TOPIC]]
	                Main Keywords: [[MAIN_KEYWORDS]]
	                Related Keywords: [[RELATED_KEYWORDS]]
	                Language: [[LANG]]
	                Number of Titles: [[NO_OF_TITLE]]
	                Tone: [[TONE]]

        The titles should incorporate at least one main keyword and one or more related keywords while maintaining clarity, appeal, and relevance to the topic. Each title must be compelling, engaging, and no longer than 12 words. Provide the output in the following JSON format: [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]
        [[TOPIC]]
        The Power of AI Chats

        [[LANG]]
        English

        [[MAIN_KEYWORDS]]
        AI Conversational Tools

        [[RELATED_KEYWORDS]]
        Conversational AI Applications,Natural Language Processing Chatbots

        [[NO_OF_TITLE]]
        1
        
        [[TONE]]
        Select

        [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]
        {
            "titles": [
                "Title 1",
                "Title 2",
                "Title 3", 
                "... up to the number of titles requested"
            ]
        }
